question: What is Premise?
answer: Our mission is to improve people’s communities and livelihoods around the world by increasing economic and societal transparency. We index and analyze millions of observations captured daily, unearthing connections between them to map reality on the ground.

question: What’s required?
answer: All you need is an Android phone and a bit of time. Tasks can be completed when it’s convenient for you during the course of your day.

question: How do I sign up?
answer: The app is available to download for free in the Google Play store for the nearly 30 countries where we have Premise networks. To sign up, all you need to do is log in to the app and provide your location.  If the app isn’t available on Google Play in your country, please send us an email to usa@premise.com and we’ll let you know when it’s available.

question: How do I earn money?
answer: We pay for each accepted observation. In most countries, you get paid as soon as 24 hours after submission.

question: How quickly will I get paid?
answer: If you’re in a country where we offer in-app payments, you can get paid as soon as the day after you start sending in data. Once you send the photos, we’ll take some time to review them and you’ll earn points as soon as we accept them.  For all other countries, we send payment weekly via your preferred payment method. Please email payments@premise.com if you do not see in-app cashout options in your app and you have not yet given us your preferred payment option -- we’ll be happy to get you set up.

question: Why is Premise doing this research?
answer: This research helps our clients around the world get insight into what’s happening on the ground in places where the official data is harder to come by.

question: How much do you pay?
answer: We pay for each accepted observation, and the price per observation varies by country. When you log in to the app for the first time, you’ll get an email with full details on payment amounts for your country.

question: What’s the minimum amount of data I need to submit every day in order to work for Premise?
answer: There’s no minimum. You’re welcome to work with us as much or as little as you would like.

question: What if I can’t log into the app or am having technical issues?
answer: Please submit all technical issues via the app. If you can’t log in, you can send an email to support@premise.com
